description: Episode of Series "March of Time". The problems of old age as they affect people in the United States - achievements of medical science in forestalling disease, controlling dangerous ailments earlier in life; with a longer life expectancy, an increasing population of old people; ways of combating prejudices against employing old persons. Some notable personalities of advanced years including Sir Winston Churchill, Dorothy Dix and George Bernard Shaw.
